dict.acceptation: 陪审团；（展览会，竞赛等的）全体评审员；舆论的裁决；评判委员会；
应急的；[航]（船上）应急用的；暂时的；

sent.orig: A mock jury is a jury selected to match the profile of the actual jury.
sent.trans: 模拟陪审团是被选出的能与真正的陪审团相当的陪审团。

sent.orig: The jury arrives at its verdict in the seclusion of the jury room.
sent.trans: 陪审团在隔离的评议室里作出裁定。

sent.orig: He has been called for jury service or us for jury duty.
That was after a the company lost Jury a jury trial over the a business disbutesdispute.
sent.trans: 在此之前，梅西公司在商业纠纷中损失了一名陪审员。

sent.orig: The jury is/are still out, ie Members of the jury are still thinking about their decision.
